channel.title: Mind the Math
channel.description: Recent content on Mind the Math

item.title: General Information About Workshops
item.description: Learn how Mind the Math structures and prices its workshops.

item.title: Mind the Math: Innovating at the Speed of Thought
item.description: Welcome to Mind the Math, where innovation meets mathematics. We are a multidisciplinary consulting firm that specializes in connecting the latest research in academia with the practical application of software development. Our goal is to help teams achieve their outcomes more effectively and efficiently by leveraging the power of technology. Michael Pilosov, PhD Mind the Math was founded by Michael Pilosov, a computational mathematician with a unique ability to bring together scientific and creative disciplines in real-world applications.

item.title: Service Offerings
item.description: At Mind the Math, we offer a range of services to help teams and organizations achieve their goals more effectively and efficiently. Whether you’re looking to improve your data science and machine learning skills, or you need help applying mathematics and software to real-world problems, we have the expertise to help. Workshops Our workshops are designed to educate and train teams in the latest methods and techniques for data science and machine learning.

item.title: Get in Touch
item.description: Get in touch with Mind the Math to learn how we can help you achieve your goals.

item.title: Reproducible Research Papers
item.description: Making Your Research Reproducible with LaTeX and Containerization

item.title: Version-Controlled Research
item.description: The Basics of Git and Repository Hosting Services for Better Research Tracking and Collaboration

item.title: Making Effective Posters and Presentations with LaTeX
item.description: Enhance Your Presentation Skills and Improve Your Research Communication with LaTeX

item.title: Deploying JupyterHub with Docker-Compose: A Workshop for Academic Teams
item.description: Learn to deploy JupyterHub using docker-compose to improve computational reproducibility, facilitate team collaboration, and provide a flexible, OS-agnostic interface for research.

item.title: Effective Use of Jupyter Notebooks in Research Process
item.description: Learn the best practices for effectively using Jupyter notebooks in the research process to better organize and streamline your work.

item.title: Organizing Research with MLflow
item.description: Learn to use MLflow to track experiments and reproduce results in your research.

item.title: Sharing Research with the Public: Interactive Web Applications
item.description: Learn to share your research with the broader public by creating interactive web applications using container technology, streamlit, flask, gunicorn, or static webpages.

item.description: How to fix an annoying warning.
